entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professors Dumbledore is mentioned as one of the professors in the middle of the room. (Source: 'Professors Dumbledore')

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professors McGonagall is mentioned as one of the professors in the middle of the room. (Source: 'Professors McGonagall')

relationships.description: Both Professors Dumbledore and McGonagall are present in the middle of the room. (Source: 'Professors Dumbledore, McGonagall')
